data.title: A Million Ways
data.meta_description: a million ways - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The plot summary describes the main characters and storyline of the film A Million Ways to Die in the West. Albert is a sheep farmer in 1882 Arizona who's girlfriend leaves him for being cowardly. He befriends Anna, the wife of the outlaw Clinch Leatherwood. Albert challenges the arrogant Foy to a duel to win back his girlfriend, and Anna teaches him to shoot. On the night before the duel, Anna drugs Foy. The next day, Foy gets sick from the drug. Clinch then threatens to kill Albert for kissing Anna. Albert is captured by Apaches but escapes. He eventually defeats and kills Clinch, and ends up in a relationship with Anna.
